sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Advisory Commission on Reducing the Disproportionate Representation of African-American Children in Foster Care Act
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Advisory Commission on Reducing the Disproportionate Representation of African-American Children in Foster Care Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds the following:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds the following:

sections.heading: Advisory Commission on Reducing the Disproportionate Representation of African-American Children in Foster Care.
sections.text: Advisory Commission on Reducing the Disproportionate Representation of African-American Children in Foster Care.

sections.heading: Duties. The Advisory Commission shall be a coordinating and advocating body that acts on behalf of the interests of African-American children who are at risk of placement within the State's child welfare system
sections.text: The Advisory Commission shall advise the Governor and the General Assembly, as well as w

sections.heading: Reporting requirements. The Advisory Commission shall submit an initial report on its findings and recommendations to the Governor and the General Assembly one year after it convenes its first meeting and every 2 years thereafter
sections.text: Reporting requirements. The Advisory Commission shall submit an initial report on its findings and recommendations to the Governor and the General Assembly one year after it convenes its first meeting and every 2 years thereafter.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
